snippet.title: Nighthunt - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1651870/Nighthunt/

Play as a teenager at camp where you have to run, fight, and hide from other teens to stay alive. Nighthunt is a multiplayer 3v3 stealth-action horror game where one team must defend their base and protect the radio antenna, while the other team tries to sneak in and steal it.

DEVELOPER: Neighborhood Games

PUBLISHER: Neighborhood Games

RELEASE DATE: July 25 2022

Discord: https://discord.gg/nighthunt

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1651870/Nighthunt/
